Description: Example configuration for PostDeploy API documentation export
UsageNotes: This configuration enables the PostDeploy stage to export OpenAPI specifications
from deployed API Gateway instances to an S3 bucket for documentation generation.
The PostDeployS3StaticHostBucket should be a pre-existing bucket with appropriate
permissions for the PostDeploy service role to write documentation files.
The buildspec-postdeploy-api-docs.yml will discover deployed APIs, export their
OpenAPI specs, validate them, and upload to the specified S3 bucket with metadata.
Prerequisites: Bucket policy should allow PostDeploy service role to write objects
API Gateway instances should be properly tagged for discovery
buildspec-postdeploy-api-docs.yml should be in the repository
